Hi

I tried to start a crawl-job with Heritirx 2.0.1 and the 
AdaptiveRevisitFrontier
but unfortunately I run into some NullPointerExceptions (the sheet 
config is the basic-sheet config, just edited the Frontier)

09-Oct-2008 16:59:10 org.archive.settings.jmx.LoggingDynamicMBean 
dealWithException
SEVERE: ReflectionException during requestCrawlStart (in thread 'Thread-11')
java.lang.NullPointerException
    at 
org.archive.crawler.frontier.AdaptiveRevisitFrontier.loadSeeds(AdaptiveRevisitFrontier.java:240)

Had someone else the same exception, while starting to run a revisiting 
crawl?
Or can anyone send me a working sheet that supports 
incremental/revisiting crawling ?



Best
juergen
